title: Bug 57436Java 1.5 fails to run classes produced by ajc
description: )Although 1.5 is still beta, we would want to submit a bug to Sun if ourimplementation techniques are valid, so we don't have to change thosetechniques.For 1.2, we should at document if we don't fix, since many peopleare using 1.5.
OB: Bug 57436Java 1.5 fails to run classes produced by ajc Java 1.5 beta reports a ClassFormatError when running programs (e.g., spacewar)compiled by ajc 1.1.1 and the latest CVS head.Sun's Java 1.5 betabinarycompatibility docs say that some obfuscators violated the .class formatspecification, so those .class files will fail when run under 1.5. (The docsalso say they are still incomplete.
